title: Kerning Table editor for InDesign?
content:
Anybody know of anything that works in InDesign CS like the Kerning Table editor in Quark?   
   
I know I can custom kern the typeface with TypeTool, but sometimes that's a hassle, because everybody along the line has to be using the same edited font suitcase. Is there a way to custom tweak a pair in InDesign and have it apply globally to the document?
author: imagine

comments.content:
IIRC, there's a plugin called "Cool Kerning" from "Knowbody Software."   
   
T

5{ed into in on their website. Unfortunately, it's $150 per year--they license it on a yearly basis. Fine for big companies, but not for a one-man shop like me.   
   
So, I'll keep looking . . . if anyone knows of anything else, please let me know!
